networkNoInternet: No internet connection. Please check your network.
networkTimeout: The request timed out. Please try again.
networkConnectionError: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again.
authUnauthorized: You are not authorized. Please sign in again.
authForbidden: You do not have permission to perform this action.
clientNotFound: The requested resource was not found.
clientConflict: A conflict occurred. Please try again.
clientUnprocessableEntity: The data you sent could not be processed.
serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
serverServiceUnavailable: Service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
